Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of David Howard
Dear Sir,
David Howard is hitting the ball well at AA Erie Sea Wolves!
He has an AVG of .301, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Francisco Melendez
Dear Sir,
Francisco Melendez has an AVG of .221 at AA Erie Sea Wolves!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director

elsewhere!

Ron Darling
